para_sentences.para_0: At this point, you should be able to answer all of the following questions.
para_sentences.para_1: If you are unsure of any of these answers, take some time to review the course materials. Feel free to post questions into the General Q&A Discussion. Next week's lessons will be easier if you have invested in mastering this week's learning outcomes.
para_sentences.para_2: Check the Explorations and Task List in the Week 2 - Overview to review learning materials and make sure you have completed all required activities for this week.

ul_0: How to solve simple recurrence relations?
What are the three methods of solving a recurrence relation?
How to implement a divide-and-conquer algorithm?
How to solve a problem using the divide-and-conquer strategy?

heading_sentences: Review - Recursion  Recurrence Relations and Divide & Conquer
